dailyNormaModal.formulaDescSymbol: V is the volume of the water norm in liters per day, M is your body weight, T is the time of active sports, or another type of activity commensurate in terms of loads (in the absence of these, you must set 0)
dailyNormaModal.questionText2: The time of active participation in sports or other activities with a high physical. Load in hours
dailyNormaModal.requiredAmountText: The required amount of water in liters per day
dailyNormaModal.howMuchText: Write down how much water you will drink
